import React, { Component } from 'react' import BookService from '../service/BookService' class BookComponent extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={ book:[] } } componentDidMount(){ BookService.getBook().then((res)=>{ this.setState({book: res.data}); }); } render() { return (
{/*

First name Last name Email Delete/Update Delete/Update Delete/Update Delete/Update

*/}
{ this.state.book.map( book=>
{book.bookName}

{book.description}

  • Price : {book.price}
  • release date :{book.releaseDate}
  • Price : {book.author}

Buy it now

)}
) } } export default BookComponent;
